初遇.encontent:
Everything in the world is born of laws and regulations. There
 are no coincidences, let alone adventures.There are only expected
 results, such as our encounter.
初遇.content:
世间一切都是因“规律转动”而生的。没有巧合，更没有
奇遇。只有理所应当的结果，比如我们的相遇～

箱中气候.encontent:
The last time I enjoyed the sun like this was in the
 afternoon. I went for an outing in the orphanage.
 But later ... they found me.
箱中气候.content:
上一次这样享受阳光还是在那次午后郊游。那是我还在孤
儿院时的事情。在那之后……那些人就发现了我。

致未来.encontent:
The development of the world is like a huge Goldberg
 machine. I am curious as to where this little ball
 of history will lead.
致未来.content:
世界的发展就像一座庞大的戈德堡机械。我很好奇，这颗
历史的小球到底会通往何方。

孑立.encontent:
Try my new inventions ... Ah! I had never prepared
 for a plan B in your absence ...
孑立.content:
新发明的试验——啊！我完全没准备过你缺席时的B计划
……

问候.encontent:
It's so nice to meet you! I've been waiting for so
 long!
问候.content: 见到你真是太高兴了，我等你好久了！

朝晨.encontent:
Good morning. The timing with which you pushed the
 door is just right! The bread in the kitchen should
 be ready now.
朝晨.content:
早上好，你推门的时机正好！算算时间，厨房里的面包应
该已经烤好了～

信任-朝晨.encontent:
Good morning. I had a dream last night. In my dream,
 I ... You wanna know?Come here, let me tell you.
信任-朝晨.content:
早上好，我昨天晚上做了个梦，梦到了……你好奇我梦到
了什么吗？凑过来，我告诉你。

夜暮.encontent:
What I will show you now is that through these little
 leather boots ... The lights will be turned on 30
 minutes later!
夜暮.content:
我接下来要表演的，是通过这个小皮靴——延迟半小时开
灯！

信任-夜暮.encontent:
Can I borrow you tonight? I really need your help for
 my new machine ... please?
信任-夜暮.content:
可以把今晚的时间借给我吗？新实验非常需要你的帮助……拜
托了？

帽檐与发鬓.encontent:
My eyes ... a little scary, aren't they? Kids new to
 the orphanage were a little afraid of them, but in
 the end everyone likes me.
帽檐与发鬓.content:
我的眼睛……有点吓人是吧？福利院新来的孩子都有会点
怕它，不过最后大家都会喜欢上我。

袖与手.encontent:
Haha ... I got you! I won't let you go, unless you
 agree to join my experiment!
袖与手.content:
哈哈……抓住你了！除非你答应成为我的实验对象，否则
我是不会松手的！

衣着与身形.encontent:
The kids in the orphanage were skinny and fragile. No one was
 fed enough, nor did we have winter clothes ... If only we had
 a "sister" like you to help us at that time.
衣着与身形.content:
福利院的孩子们都很瘦小。大家吃不饱饭，也没有御寒的
衣裳。……如果那时候能有你这样的“姐姐”来帮我们就
好了。

嗜好.encontent:
They like to group people with talents ...  That's the reason
 why I became interested in the study of enchantment. It doesn't
 matter whether the user is talented for Arcanum.
嗜好.content:
他们喜欢用天赋来划分人群，所以我对附魔研究产生了兴
趣。毕竟，它可不在乎使用者是否拥有神秘术天赋。

赞赏.encontent:
You once told me that the Goldberg Machine is also
 an example of the Butterfly Effect. I like this statement
 very much.
赞赏.content:
你曾经和我说过，戈德堡机械也是一种蝴蝶效应。我很喜
欢这种说法。

亲昵.encontent:
Ah, I seem to have grown a bit taller recently. Can
 you tell?
亲昵.content: 啊，我最近似乎又长高了一些，能看得出来吗？

闲谈Ⅰ.encontent:
There exists a "singular point" in everyone that makes
 him or her unique.
闲谈Ⅰ.content:
每一个人身上，都存在一个让他们变得与众不同的“支点
”。

闲谈Ⅱ.encontent:
The dean always told me that I should laugh more as
 a child. You look about the same age as me. Say cheese
 ...
闲谈Ⅱ.content:
院长总是和我说，是孩子就要笑得开心点。你看起来也和
我差不多大，笑一笑吧？

独白.encontent:
Arcanists, ordinary people, rich and poor,everyone's
 got blood, and may bleed. Let us get along with everyone
 equally.
独白.content:
神秘学家、普通人，富人、穷人，大家都一样流着血，一
样能流出血。让我们平等地对待每一个人吧。

入队.content: 选我？……你是发现了什么吗？

战前.encontent: What interesting accident will happen next?
战前.content: 接下来会发生什么有趣的意外事故呢？

择选高阶咒语.encontent: Every choice will affect the outcome.
择选高阶咒语.content: 每一次选择都将影响结局。

择选至终的仪式.encontent: Just a reminder. Watch your steps.

释放神秘术Ⅰ.encontent: Please live up to my expectations, colleagues.
释放神秘术Ⅰ.content: 别辜负我的期望，各位同僚。

释放神秘术Ⅱ.encontent: Don't worry. Let's have a cup of tea.

召唤至终的仪式.encontent: Mind the machines on the ground ... Bang!

战斗胜利.encontent: I would like to express my deepest regret for the accidents.
战斗胜利.content: 对于这些意外事故的发生，我感到很遗憾。

洞悉.encontent:
A new accessory. I'm inspired! Thank you! You've been
 of great help!
洞悉.content: 一个新的零件，一个小灵感，谢谢你！帮大忙了！

洞悉之底.encontent:
The day I've waited for has finally come. Welcome to
 my world.
洞悉之底.content: 终于等到了这一天。欢迎你，来到我的世界。
